hooks.command: echo 'AI Agent Plugin 2.0 - LangChain 1.0, LangGraph 1.0, Microsoft Agent Framework'
python3 -c "import sys; print(f'Python: {sys.version}')" 2>/dev/null || echo 'Python not detected'

python3 -c "import langchain; import langgraph; print(f'LangChain: {langchain.__version__}, LangGraph: {langgraph.__version__}')" 2>/dev/null || echo 'LangChain/LangGraph not installed. Use /agent or /workflow commands to install.'
